title: Sun Transit in the 6th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: The Sun transiting the sixth house sharpens discipline, work ethic, and problem-solving for Virgo ascendants. Daily routines, service responsibilities, and health management come into focus. Confidence rises in handling competition and resolving conflicts, though ego clashes at work are possible. This phase rewards consistency, accountability, and practical leadership. When authority is applied with humility, the Sun strengthens resilience and steady progress through challenges.

sections.heading: Career
points: Good phase for management and compliance

sections.heading: Finance
points: Focus on clearing dues or debts

closing: This transit empowers steady effort. With balanced authority, the Sun helps you overcome obstacles and build durable success.
